subject: Update tutorial and docs to reflect broader tool scope
body:
The tool evolved beyond social media ads to support multi-page
documents, presentations, stories, and print formats. Updated
TutorialModal, CLAUDE.md, README, USER_GUIDE, and TODO to use
broader "visual design tool" framing instead of "social media ads".

https://claude.ai/code/session_013hywBGVNYi6RR3sQcDG3b7
title: Update tutorial and docs to reflect broader tool scope
